message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Let's start with a fair split.  We can negotiate later if needed.
Considering inflation, I need a bit more
Inflation is hitting us both, but I think a 55/45 split is reasonable given our current situation.
Inflation is costing me, I need to adjust
We're both losing money with each round.  Let's split it 60/40 this time to try and recover some of our losses.
Time is running out, let's settle
We're getting close to the end. I'm willing to go up to a 65/35 split to avoid getting nothing at all.
Last chance for a reasonable deal
This is my final offer. If we don't agree, we both get nothing.  Let's make it happen.
